definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be or become warm (NH id., Pi., make warm, Aram. h.am, [[חֲמַם]] be warm; Ar. h.am+a become hot, of water; also heat, kindle fire in)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[חַם]] Ps 39:4, Ex 16:21; [[וְחַם]] consec. 1Ki 1:2, Ec 4:11; [[חַמּוֹתִ֫י]] Is 44:16; Impf. [[יׇחׂם]] Is 44:16; [[וַיׇּ֫חָם]] 2Ki 4:34, Is 44:15; also [[יִחַם]] 1Ki 1:1; [[יֵחַם]] De 19:6; [[יֵחָָם]] Ec 4:11; 3 fs. [[תֵּחַם]] Ez Eze 24:11; [[יֵחַמּוּ]] Ho 7:7; [[וַיֶּחֱמוּ]] Ge 30:39; [[וַיֵּחַמְנׇה]] v:Ge 30:38 (last seven forms could be also from [[יחם]] q.v.; but no decisive evidence that this √ is used in Qal; they are placed under [[חמם]] by Thes Ew:§ 193 a Ol:§ 243 b; v. also Kö:i. 365, 417 ff., who on account of [[יחם]] Pi. Inf. Ge 30:41, Ge 31:10, der. last two, needlessly, fr. [[יחם]]); Inf. [[לַחְמָם]] Is 47:14, cf. Job 30:4 (where, however, ´[[ל]] is fr. [[לֶחֶם]] Mich Di unless (Luzz Che) we read [[לְחַמֵּם]] Pi. Inf. in both); [[חׂם]] 1Sa 11:9, Hag 1:6, Ne 7:3; sf. [[חֻמּוֹ]] Job 6:17; [[חֻמָּם]] Je 51:39; —

lit., be or grow warm Ex 16:21 (P; subj. [[שֶׁמֶשׁ]]), cf. 1Sa 11:9, Ne 7:3 and Job 6:l7 (sf. of impers. subj.); from fire Is 44:15, Is 44:16, Is 44:16, Is 47:14 (cf. supr.); natural heat 1Ki 1:1, 1Ki 1:2 (by personal contact), so 2Ki 4:34, Ec 4:11, Ec 4:11, fr. clothing Hag 1:6; of Jerusalem under fig. of pot or caldron Ez Eze 24:11.
fig., subj. [[לִבִּי]] Ps 39:4 (‖[[בַהֲגִיגִי תִבְעַר־אֵשׁ]]), cf. De 19:6; of conspirators Ho 7:7; Chaldeans Je 51:39.
of heat in conception (animals) Ge 30:38, Ge 30:39 (cf. [[יחם]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[נֵחָמִים באלים]] Is 57:5 (Kö:i. 371), inflame oneself with, of idolatry.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תְּחַמֵּם]] Job 39:14 keep  eggs warm (of ostrich).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִתְחַמָּם]] warm oneself Job 31:20 [[מִגֵּז כְּבָשִׂים]] by means of fleece of sheep.
